alert.note: Alert for Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Northampton County through 845 PM EDT... At 750 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Halifax, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy downpours, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Garysburg, Gaston, Weldon, Jackson, Mud Castle, Pleasant Grove, Pleasant Hill, Gum Forks, Gumberry, Turners Crossroads and Roanoke Rapids Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
